dashboard.description:
# Application consistency This dashboard presents the version dispersion of three major applications: Java, Microsoft Outlook and Adobe Acrobat. Assuring that each user has the right version of an application can prevent them from running into problems.
::: tip You can extend this dashboard to measure the version dispersion of other applications by duplicating the metrics in Finder and creating the corresponding widgets here. :::
dashboard.name: Application consistency

metric.label: Top 100 Java binaries with highest number of devices
Top 100 Outlook binaries with highest number of devices
Copy of Top 100 Adobe Acrobat binaries with highest number of devices

dashboard.description: # Application health This dashboard displays the applications experiencing the most issues. Issues taken into account are: - Crashes - Freezes - Long network response times - High application thread CPU
dashboard.name: Application health

tableConfig.title: Applications with highest average network response time

metric.label: Top 100 Applications with highest average network response time
Top 100 applications with most CPU issues

dashboard.description:
# Proactive Improvement This module gives you a set of metrics that help you to improve your service before issues arise or users complain. These are split into the following dashboards: - **Hardware ratings**: investigate the performance of your devices, discovering users impacted by low-performing devices. - **Application health and consistency**: uncover the applications causing the most issues for users, and ascertain the version dispersion of three primary software packages. - **User experience**: discover major impactors to security, system stability and networking on your end-users' devices.
# Hardware ratings In this dashboard, devices are rated according to their hardware (CPU, memory, graphical card and hard disk are taken into account). Devices experiencing performance issues are also reported: - Devices using a lot of CPU more than 10% of the time - Devices using a lot of memory more than 30% of the time - Devices using more than 80% of their hard drive
dashboard.name: Hardware ratings

tableConfig.title: Devices with highest high CPU time

metric.label: Top 100 devices with highest high CPU time

tableConfig.title: Devices with highest high memory time

metric.label: Top 100 Devices with highest high memory time

dashboard.description: # User experience This dashboard lists various issues that may impact your IT infrastructure and/or your end-users. They are broken down into 3 sections: * **security issues**: malwares, OSs without support, antivirus/firewall issues, dangerous domains being accessed. * **networking issues**: high network response time, large amounts of failed connections/web requests * **stability issues on devices**: bluescreens, hard resets, application crashes and freezes, high consumption of CPU and memory
dashboard.name: User experience

metric.label: AV, Firewall or Windows protection issues
AV, firewall or Windows protection issues
